Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Agreed out of all reviewer response activities (SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, SW-Reviewer Unavailable, SW-Reviewer No Response)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Percentage of cases with at least one SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all cases

Name: Number of SW-Reviewer Agreed that are preceded by SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' activities for cases where activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Agreed that occur after Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Frequency of SW-Reviewer Agreed in variants with SW-EIC Accept versus variants with SW-EIC Reject
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Agreed followed by SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Number of SW-Reviewer Agreed relative to SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' activities for cases where activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Agreed in first review round versus subsequent review rounds
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all cases

Name: Average number of SW-Reviewer Agreed per manuscript submission
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Agreed that occur after multiple SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Frequency of SW-Reviewer Agreed in variants with major revisions versus minor revisions
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Number of SW-Reviewer Agreed relative to SW-Initial Reviewer Selection
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Agreed that lead to completed review process
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all cases

Name: Ratio of SW-Reviewer Agreed to SW-Reviewer Declined
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Agreed occurring after deadline reminders (SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week, SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 3 days, SW-Reviewer Selection is now due)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week'

Name: Number of SW-Reviewer Agreed in successful manuscript acceptance pathways
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Agreed that result in timely review completion
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Reviewer Agreed in challenge paper assignments versus regular assignments
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers Challenge Paper'

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Agreed relative to total reviewer invitation activities
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all cases

Name: Number of SW-Reviewer Agreed per case
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' activities
